title: Platinum-Diamond team looking for coach.
body:
Hello, my name's Phili and I'm currently leading a team of a couple of Plat and Dia players. The team is slightly new (~2 months) but concidering that, the 
synergy is looking realy good. We've had a coach already, who unfortunatly couldn't continue.

For now the coach spot is still free, despide a person already wanting it. We basicly still want to see if there's a better option.

The team itself is going to participate at Tournaments and at a grand League from January onwards.

There are no real requirements for now, just saying - The last Support has been an ex Master Coach and been D2 himself.


So if your interessted in coaching a team to a fiew pricepool-oriented Tourneys, go ahead and give me an add:    2N Phili
